attributes.action: make all healthy citizens of the UK  to be made complusory blood donors.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We all know how precious blood is and how bad the shortages are.  My petition is that the government should make it complusory for all healthy UK residents be tested to see if they can give blood.  If they can, then to give it twice to three times a year.  This would stop the shortage of blood in the UK.
